summary: The world's rarest and cutest creature, Amazon Jack, lives on a peaceful island. When a greedy millionaire puts out a reward to find him, Jack must leave his home, evade capture, and outwit the tycoon before he ends up in a zoo!
cast: Jesper Klein|Kaya Brüel|Claus Ryskjær|Ole Fick|Anne Marie Helger|Søs Egelind|Dick Kaysø|Peter Frödin|Flemming Quist Møller|Nis Bank-Mikkelsen|Ashley Bril|Ash Crist|Simon Crist|Lisbet Dahl|Ditte Gråbøl|Morten Holst|Anthony Lawson|Esben Pretzmann|Shannon Settlemyre|Matthew Warzel
director: Directors: Jørgen Lerdam, Flemming Quist Møller | 1 more credit »
title: Jungledyret Hugo: Fræk, flabet og fri
